thread.title: BRIEF-Celgene Corp Says CEO Mark Alles's FY 2017 Total Compensation Was $13.1 Mln Vs $12.2 Mln In FY 2016

title: BRIEF-Celgene Corp Says CEO Mark Alles's FY 2017 Total Compensation Was $13.1 Mln Vs $12.2 Mln In FY 2016
text:
Market News April 30, 2018 / 1:00 PM / Updated 4 minutes ago BRIEF-Celgene Corp Says CEO Mark Alles's FY 2017 Total Compensation Was $13.1 Mln Vs $12.2 Mln In FY 2016 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
April 30 (Reuters) - Celgene Corp:
* CELGENE CORP SAYS CEO MARK ALLESâ€™S FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $13.1 MILLION VERSUS $12.2 MILLION IN FY 2016 - SEC FILING
* CELGENE CORP - EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN ROBERT HUGIN'S FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $12 MILLION VERSUS $16.5 MILLION IN 2016 Source text: ( bit.ly/2raDvwO ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
